sect1.title: TRIM

row.entry: The string from which to remove spaces.

Optional. Specify which spaces to remove. Valid flag values are: RIGHT (remove trailing spacesâ€”this is the default), LEFT (remove leading spaces), LEFT, RIGHT (remove leading and trailing spaces), and ALL (remove all spaces, even those within the string_value).

sect1.para: The TRIM function returns the string_value with all trailing and/or leading spaces removed.
